name: cooking_cancel
description: This function is used to cancel the current cooking process on a cooker.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device whose cooking process is being canceled.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The specific compartment of the device whose cooking process is being canceled.

parameters.name: groupAction
parameters.description: The group action related to the devices.
